Consumable (Substance)

A powerful painkiller, karrak allows creatures to continue through the most grievous injuries. As an action, you can apply this substance to a creature within 5 feet. For the next hour, the creature experiences a high that allows them to roll an additional [[/r d12]] when making an ability check or saving throw using Constitution, and at the start of each of the creature's turns it gains [[/r 2d12]] temporary hit points. At the end of the high, the creature must succeed on a DC 24 Wisdom saving throw or experience a low that lasts 8 hours, during which they must roll a [[/r d12]] and subtract the result when making an ability check or saving throw using Constitution, and for the duration their current and maximum hit points are reduced by [[/r 2d12]]. If this would reduce your maximum hit points below 1, it instead becomes 1. At the end of the low, the creature must make a DC 24 Constitution throw to resist addiction.
